shift action: replace selected text with paired yanked text
split selected text on regex matches
action: select regex matches in selected text

key:
,#0047A0,extend to next word start,',#0047A0,select to next word start

Z,#C9C8C3,save selections,z,#C9C8C3,restore selections
X,#C9C8C3,,x,#E06C76,expand selections to contain full lines
C,#0047A0,copy selection on next lines,c,#E06C76,change selected text
V,#0047A0,extend to next word start,v,#0047A0,select to next word start 
B,#0047A0,extend to previous word start,b,#0047A0,select to previous word start
N,#0047A0,extend with next current search pattern match,n,#0047A0,select next current search pattern match
M,#0047A0,extend to previous word start,m,#0047A0,select to previous word start
<,#E06C76,repeat last action,ï¼Œ,#E06C76,repeat last action
>,#E06C76,repeat last action,.,#E06C76,repeat last action
?,#0047A0,extend to next current search pattern match,/,#0047A0,select next current search pattern match
